name: TKTokenSession
desc: A token session that manages the authentication state of a token.

items.name: init(token: TKToken)
items.desc: Initializes a token session with the specified token.

items.name: protocol TKTokenSessionDelegate
items.desc: The interface that a session instance delegate implements to respond to token session authentication events.

items.name: var token: TKToken
items.desc: The token to which the session is bound.
